channel.title: Is our "time up"?
channel.description:
I should have thought a lot more before making this topic...but I think I needed to.
I don't know about any of you, but my friends(most programmers), are the same. I got really non-sociable being so involved with RuneScape, then Private servers. I stopped skating...Which is what I used to do all the time. This coding shit consumes me...And I noticed more and more are quitting, but this time...it's all at once. I had and still do have myself convinced I want to get my life back and give this all up when school starts again. But I doubt I will...I wonder if it was just a stupid idea to get involved in private servers. Look at how pathetic we are...Striving to make our on version of a game some think is ruined...But it's never ending. And we do not really benefit from it at all. I used to think about coding and new methods and new ways to add things new things to improve when I was bored, or wasn't here basically. I mean, it's 2:30 AM in the morning and I'm doing this...I don't even talk to my friends anymore and I barely talked to anyone during the whole school year. Maybe it's time to give all of this up and move on...Without the crashers and botnetters and DoSers...It's a waste. I don't know if I'll leave or not, [b] but if you're new, I suggest you leave now before you waste your time...[/b] I'm sorry that this is not in the right section, but I needed to say this.
[b]Codeusa is doing, and thinks the same. I guess I am not the only one.

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

java got me compiled:

EPIC FAIL

I really don’t think you should talk.

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:8, topic:222425”][quote author=Patrickftw link=topic=292135.msg2353578#msg2353578 date=1217187753]
Yeah, but you guys aren’t getting my point, Why are we racing Jagex copying everything they do trying to make our own version…
[/quote]
How are we racing Jagex? We’re not even moving from 317.[/quote]
It doesn’t matter because we are trying to do everything they do, such as moving to a 474, 503, getting something like godsword specs for a 317 or 377. Because we are not moving, does not mean we are not trying.

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Hi_HiyaScape Hi HiyaScape
item.description:
@Hi_HiyaScape wrote:

I agree with Yz85Racer, you should just make a plan for how many hours you play each day. And we are not racing Java we are just wanna-bes compared to actuall Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

dont mind me im just the guy that everybody hates

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

We aren’t racing jagex at all. in fact, how can we really? We took this idea from them, well not literaly but i guess if you think about it, we copied it. but it wasnt to screw Jagex or any other private server user over. No one means or wants to have their life consumed by some game programing, and you don’t have to. Like Yz said, take a break bro. Come back if you want, and when you do, it could be like a whole new experience. The reason i think everyone makes private servers is obvious really, we want to customize them to how we would want to play this game. It’s what we want, not that it wants you. the game can’t control you if you control the game, and yourself. We’ve made a comunity, a whole new world away from a world, that doesnt mean you have to dedicate your life to it? and im sure thats not what you meant to come off as Pat, but its a view of it. If you look past the negatives, theres a way to get past what you think of the game and balance your real life and well… programing life? lol. just take a break, i know i would. Actualy i have.

haha, i kinda look at this and realize im in the Help section. i came here to help some poor sap, and hopefully i did ^-^ GL Pat

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Patrickftw:

Yeah, but you guys aren’t getting my point, Why are we racing Jagex copying everything they do trying to make our own version…

How are we racing Jagex? We’re not even moving from 317.

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Meli Meli
item.description:
@Meli wrote:

because… people don’t want to pay for membership on runescape… so they go to private servers…and the people who code private servers…want all the new stuff…like the godswords etc…
to improve there server and make it better…people want to pk like they did along time ago be for bounty hunter…so they add the new and yet they keep the old stuff like pking…

this is what i think… and it’s also my answer to your question…

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[quote=“Patrickftw, post:1, topic:222425”]I should have thought a lot more before making this topic…but I think I needed to.

I don’t know about any of you, but my friends(most programmers), are the same. I got really non-sociable being so involved with RuneScape, then Private servers. I stopped skating…Which is what I used to do all the time. This coding shit consumes me…And I noticed more and more are quitting, but this time…it’s all at once. I had and still do have myself convinced I want to get my life back and give this all up when school starts again. But I doubt I will…I wonder if it was just a stupid idea to get involved in private servers. Look at how pathetic we are…Striving to make our on version of a game some think is ruined…But it’s never ending. And we do not really benefit from it at all. I used to think about coding and new methods and new ways to add things new things to improve when I was bored, or wasn’t here basically. I mean, it’s 2:30 AM in the morning and I’m doing this…I don’t even talk to my friends anymore and I barely talked to anyone during the whole school year. Maybe it’s time to give all of this up and move on…Without the crashers and botnetters and DoSers…It’s a waste. I don’t know if I’ll leave or not, but if you’re new, I suggest you leave now before you waste your time…
I’m sorry that this is not in the right section, but I needed to say this.

[b]Codeusa is doing, and thinks the same. I guess I am not the only one.[/quote]

O.o i has a life, lol.
I code during the night spend most of my time with my girlfriend, and i still manage to keep my forums to perfection and my server up 24/7 its just having the right staff

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

I have only lost, a few friends to this but have begin to isolate myself from every.

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Yz85Racer:

as I am sure you are one of those outcast of society skateboarders,

Not really >.> I aggressive skate, It’s the fact that I don’t do it anymore and I don’t talk to my friends that much anymore. Sometimes I go dirtbike with my dad and brother, anyways I’m not worried about the public, or how much time I spend…It’s just that it’s never ending, we’re racing professional programmers…We’re trying to make our own version of the game we like to play, it’s near pointless and as I said, more and more of my friends are quitting and I’m starting to realize why, finally.

Read full topic

item.title: Is our "time up"?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

If you’re worried about how much you spend programming or on these forums just take a break, or limit your hours. I’m not that particularly worried about that, as when I’m not on these forums I’m either training/competing or at school. It doesn’t matter, because I race Motocross and do Muay-Thai, so my parents don’t worry about it.

Just my opinion: it’s up to you. If you’re doing this from the thought of what the public sees you as, as I am sure you are one of those outcast of society skateboarders, who wears his hat off to the side… Humor aside, who cares what the public views you as? The public will only go against you. Your friends? So your friends are worried about how unsocial you are… I don’t think they can be that good of mates of yours, then.

Read full topic
